description: Integrated add asset form for adding assets of a vehicle tracking service application Finder Lbs GPS Tracking using get and post API
Sorted the list of assets for three different parameters (Active,Date & Name)
managed the states and integrated the data of different reports in Areachart and Piechart using Recharts
Developed UI of ProductDetails screen and FilterProducts screen using React Native
Designed their main website (softifydigital.com) using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Owl Carousal and vanilla JavaScript & JQuery.

Created Checkout page, Single Product page using Bootstrap and CSS3 and designed and implemented pop ups using jQuery of an e-commerce site Islampur Market  and tested the website to identify the bugs.
